{"id":1797772687,"question_id":3245,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1760139469,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1797772687/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Beautiful Indices in the Given Array I","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> beautifulIndices(string s, string a, string b, int k) {\n        // step 1: find all possible j indices by comparing substrings O(N)\n        // step 2: create an array for all j, s.t. the distance k away are all labeled with corresponding j\n        // step 3: loop through and find all i indices, and check if there exist j\n\n        if (s.size() < a.size())\n            return {};\n\n        int N = (int)s.size();\n        vector<int> vj;\n        for (int i=0; i<=N-b.size(); i++) {\n            if (b == s.substr(i, b.size())) \n                vj.push_back(i); \n        }\n\n        vector<int> intv(N, 0);\n        for (int i : vj) {\n            for (int j=-k; j<=k; j++)\n                if (i + j >= 0 && i + j < N)\n                    intv[i+j] = 1;\n        }\n\n        vector<int> vi;\n        for (int i=0; i<=N-a.size(); i++) {\n            if (a == s.substr(i, a.size()) && intv[i]) \n                vi.push_back(i);\n        }\n\n        return vi;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-beautiful-indices-in-the-given-array-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1253}
